attributes.action: Hold a new referendum on EU membership based on current facts and options
attributes.additional_details: We need a separate second referendum, and do not want this linked to any general election, as the public may well want to vote differently on this issue to other domestic or political issues.
attributes.background:
The EU referendum 2016 was based on few facts, false promises, and no plan of how we were going to actually achieve this. 

Now we have more information about the options, the benefits and the consequences, the public can make an informed vote based on real options.
